metadata.title: CVE-2014-5013 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
DOMPDF before 0.6.2 allows remote code execution, a related issue toCVE-2014-2383.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-5013` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-dompdf - 0.6.2+dfsg-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: php-dompdf package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.6.2+dfsg-3').
